name: 黃琮昇
objective:
數學基礎簡介，轉換函數，訊號流程圖，實際系統數學模式之求得，狀態方程式，線性系統之穩定度分析，控制系統之時域分析，根值軌跡圖，控制系統之頻域分析，時域及頻域下之控制器設計。
Course Title:Automatic Control Practice
Description:This course is first to introduce the basic concepts of
control systems and the mathematical background, second, state the
transfer function, block diagram and signal  flow graph, third,
discuss the mathematical modeling of control systems and elements, and
forth, describe the time-domain analysis, root locus techniques and
frequency-domain of control systems, and then to measure the character
of control systems, Finally, the design of control system will be
introduced.
schedule:
Week 1: Introduction
Week 2: Modeling in the Frequency Domain
Week 3: Modeling in the Frequency Domain
Week 4: Time Response
Week 5: Reduction of Multiple Subsystems
Week 6: Stability
Week 7: Steady-State Errors
Week 8: Steady-State Errors
Week 9: Midterm Exam
Week 10: Root Locus Techniques
Week 11: Design via Root Locus
Week 12: Design via Root Locus
Week 13: Frequency Response Techniques
Week 14: Frequency Response Techniques
Week 15: Design via Frequency Response
Week 16: Design via Frequency Response
Week 17: State Space Representation
Week 18: Final Exam
materials: Textbook: Norman S. Nise, Control Systems Engineering, 8/e, John Wiley & Sons, 2019. (Agent by Tsanghai Book Co. (滄海圖書)).
